commitMessage.title: Remove test note (NOTE-MODAL-TEST)
commitMessage.body:
Removed development test note that was used to demonstrate the note actions modal.

Changes:
- Removed test note injection from app/(tabs)/index.tsx
- Simplified loadNotes() function (removed 37 lines)
- All notes now load directly from database without special cases
- Updated CHANGELOG.md

Reason:
The test note served its purpose during modal development. All notes now have
consistent menu behavior (popup menu + long press modal), making the test note
redundant. Removing it cleans up the codebase and improves user experience.

Testing:
- Verified All Notes view loads correctly without test note
- Confirmed folder filtering still works
- Tested note actions (menu, long press, expand) on real notes
- Verified refresh functionality works
